data.comment: Today's referee, Alan Kelly, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alan Kelly signals a Atlanta throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Cincinnati.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 5, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Goal! Atlanta have got their heads in front thanks to a Adam Jahn strike.
In the minute 8, That's a fine assist from Jurgen Damm.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 10, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alan Kelly awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 15, Atlanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cincinnati.
Cincinnati's Jurgen Locadia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
In the minute 18, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
Atlanta surge into the attack at Mercedes-Benz Stadium but Brooks Lennonâ€™s header is off-target.
Alan Kelly awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Jahn (Atlanta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In the minute 26, Penalty! Alan Kelly points to the spot, great chance for Atlanta...
Atlanta have extended their lead to 2-0 courtesy of a Marcelino Moreno penalty.
Alan Kelly waits before resuming play because Mo Adams for Atlanta is still down.
In the minute 32, Stephen Glass (Atlanta) has taken off Mo Adams who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jeff Larentowicz is the replacement.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 35, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta just outside Cincinnati's area.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Atlanta to check on Saad Abdul-Salaam, who is grimacing with pain.
Saad Abdul-Salaam is back on the pitch.
In the minute 38, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
In the minute 43, Brandon Vazquez (Cincinnati) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Alan Kelly awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Cincinnati.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Atlanta.
In the minute 45, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 45, Haris Medunjanin for Cincinnati drives towards goal at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half is over at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Frankie Amaya (Cincinnati) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Stephen Glass (Atlanta) is making a second substitution, with Emerson Hyndman replacing Matheus Rossetto.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 48, Can Cincinnati capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tom Pettersson (Cincinnati) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
In the minute 52, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati are whistled for offside.
In the minute 54, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlanta drives forward and Marcelino Moreno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Cincinnati in Atlanta.
In the minute 62, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
The home team replace Jurgen Damm with Ezequiel Barco.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 64, Jaap Stam is making the team's first substitution at Mercedes-Benz Stadium with Siem de Jong replacing Brandon Vazquez.
Atlanta make their fourth substitution with Erick Torres replacing Adam Jahn.
In the minute 65, Alan Kelly signals a throw-in for Cincinnati, close to Atlanta's area.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Atlanta.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 80, In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Rashawn Dally is replacing Kamohelo Mokotjo for Cincinnati at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 82, Nick Hagglund is on a sub for Saad Abdul-Salaam for Cincinnati.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta are coming forward and Erick Torres gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 88, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
In Atlanta, Siem de Jong (Cincinnati) misses the target with a header.
Alan Kelly awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Marcelino Moreno with Eric Remedi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Atlanta.
At Mercedes-Benz Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Atlanta.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Andrew Gutman is booked for the away team.
